pages.text: You might have noticed some extra buttons when opening up a crafting table. $(#ffa500)$(l)Crafting Tweaks$(reset) offers some handy features to navigate the crafting grid: the $(l)top button$(reset) rotates the recipe in your grid, the $(l)middle button$(reset) balances all items evenly across the recipe and the $(l)bottom one$(reset) clears the grid back into your inventory.

Additionally, holding shift on the balance button you can also quickly spread a single stack over the entire grid, right-clicking the result slot will craft an entire stack, and there's a keybind for compressing stacks of items to its 9x9 or 4x4 recipe through a key press.
